SEARCH

Uses of Package
java.lang.template

Packages that use java.lang.template
Package
Description
java.lang
Provides classes that are fundamental to the design of the Java programming language.
java.lang.template
Provides support for string templates and template policies.
  • Classes in java.lang.template used by java.lang
    Class
    Description
    FormatterPolicy
    Preview.
    This TemplatePolicyPREVIEW constructs a String result using Formatter.
    StringPolicy
    Preview.
    This interface simplifies declaration of TemplatePolicysPREVIEW that do not throw checked exceptions and have a result type of String.
    TemplatePolicy
    Preview.
    This interface describes the methods provided by a generalized string template policy.
  • Classes in java.lang.template used by java.lang.template
    Class
    Description
    PolicyBuilder
    Preview.
    This builder class can be used to simplify the construction of a StringPolicyPREVIEW or SimplePolicyPREVIEW.
    PolicyLinkage
    Preview.
    Policies using this additional interface have the flexibility to specialize the composition of the templated string by returning a customized CallSites from applierPREVIEW.
    SimplePolicy
    Preview.
    This interface simplifies declaration of TemplatePolicysPREVIEW that do not throw checked exceptions.
    StringPolicy
    Preview.
    This interface simplifies declaration of TemplatePolicysPREVIEW that do not throw checked exceptions and have a result type of String.
    TemplatePolicy
    Preview.
    This interface describes the methods provided by a generalized string template policy.
